post.body:
How productive have you been, ZeroMe? 
Learnt any new languages?
Read any good books?
Cooked any good meals?
Have you exercised yet?
Taught yourself something new?
Conversed with your friends and family?
Gone out to enjoy nature?
Made progress towards your goals?
Saved your eternal soul?
Earned some money?
Don't let the rush and toil of modern life distract you from a very simple fact: it's your life, always has been, and always will be. Don't spend all your time for someone else (especially your boss).
If you are missing one or more of these ten, then add them to your daily routine. It's okay to miss a day or two, just try your best! The first step to bettering the world is to better yourself.

comment.body:
Attic, Koine, or Modern Greek? For Latin also you have Classical, Ecclesiastical, and Vulgar. Hebrew idk much about.
Most Attic texts are also available in Koine, which by itself also has many Byzantine texts not all translated to English or Modern Greek yet.
Most extant Latin texts are in Ecclesiastical (which also borrows words from Koine Greek and Classical and Vulgar Latin).

@Aassddff 
ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡·
ðŸ‘‘ Î£ âœ™: For the Old Testament, the Septuagint is one of the oldest and most complete translations; it is in Koine Greek (sometimes called Byzantine, or Medieval, Greek) The text is thought to be from around 200 B.C.
For the New Testament, one of the oldest good translations is the Codex Fuldensis, written in 541 A.D., mainly in Classical Latin with a bit of Vulgar.
If you want the study an old "official Bible", the Clementine Vulgate, designated as the official Bible of the Catholic Church from 1592 until 1979, is a good choice. It is in Ecclesiastical Latin.
Today, the offical Bible is the Nova Vulgata, and it is in Classical Latin.
Hope this helps!

For me:
I learned how to say 'weekend' in Lithuanian
I read the 3rd book (chapter) of Paradise Lost
I made toast and eggs with hot sauce for breakfast, and a fruit smoothie for lunch
I worked out my triceps and abs
I taught myself how to clean out a pipe under my sink
I called my parents for a while
I plan to take a walk this evening
I made $105 today, which is good because growing my business is also my immediate goal
I plan to pray tonight
10/10, today should be a good day!

So you are going to do it? Or are you just posting for attention/joking/coping? Regardless, if anyone feels this way I urge you to reconsider. No need for a ward, most people have thoughts like yours at least once in a while. Try living. And I don't mean eating, breathing, working, and sleeping. To be alive is completely different than just not being dead.

@Lajos Nagy: Good for you! It's amazing how much better life can be when you identify what you should be doing, then work towards it. Most people nowadays live as drones, paycheck to paycheck, never noticing whats around them or stopping to relax; people wonder why depression is on the rise, well sometimes it can feel like there's 4 walls around you at all times in this modern world. Fight back with self improvement, then work on helping your neighbors!

dudeweed.

I will pray for your soul.
